briefTitle: European Ambulance Acute Coronary Syndrome (ACS) Angiography Trial
officialTitle: Multi-centre, Multi-national, Prospective, Randomised, Open-label, Comparison of Bivalirudin to Other Guideline Based Current Therapies (Excluding Bivalirudin)

arms.label: Standard of Care: Heparins with Optional GPI

summary: To show that the early administration of bivalirudin improves 30 day outcomes when compared to the current standard of care in participants with ST segment elevation acute coronary syndrome (STE-ACS), intended for a primary percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) management strategy, presenting either via ambulance or to centers where PCI is not performed.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Composite Incidence of Death and Non-coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) Major Bleeding

effectByArm.arm: Standard of Care: Heparins With Optional GPI
